title: The Country and the City - 1609-1825
description: Episode one begins in 1609 and chronicles the arrival of the Dutch.

title: Order and Disorder - 1825-1865
description: Episode two looks at New York's rise as a burgeoning cultural center and multi-ethnic port.

title: Sunshine and Shadow - 1865-1898
description: Episode three turns the spotlight on greed and wealth.

title: The Power and the People - 1898-1918
description: Episode four follows New York into a new century.

title: Cosmopolis - 1919-1931
description: Episode five tells the African-American experience and the birth of the new media industries.

title: City of Tomorrow - 1929-1941
description: Episode six chronicles the dramatic and increasingly fateful events following the crash of 1929.

title: The City and the World - 1945-2000
description: Episode seven follows the turbulent and often harrowing years from 1945 to 2000.

title: The Center of the World - 1946-2003
description: Episode eight describes the rise and fall of the Twin Towers, from their construction in the 1960's to 9/11/2001.
